name: Master of Olympus - Zeus
description:
The newest game in Impressions' City Building Series, Master of Olympus - Zeus allows you to recreate your favourite legends from Greek mythology. Build and rule beautiful city-states to help Hercules defeat the Hydra or help Odysseus win the Trojan War. Make powerful allies, get involved in the affairs of immortals of the Greek Pantheon and even meet Zeus, the Father of the Gods himself! You have the power to build cities, summon heroes, and complete mythological adventures in ancient Greece.

    - Build and rule seven separate city-states in more than 40 compelling episodes.
    - Interact with over 20 animated gods, heroes and monsters who roam your cities.
    - All of your cities' residents are unique. Find out what they have to say!
    - Direct control over everything - taxes, trade, colonization, even raiding your neighbours!
    - Rule all of Greece with colonies, allies, and rivals in neighbouring cities.
    - Adjust the difficulty setting from beginner to expert.

Dedicate amazing monuments to the gods and receive gifts to help your city flourish.

Call upon the gods and famous heroes you choose by building a city that caters to their needs.

Ancient Greece comes alive with trading partners, allies, colonies and rivals.
